00020 #ifndef __TLM_FIFO_H__
00021 #define __TLM_FIFO_H__
00022 
00023 //
00024 // This implements put, get and peek
00025 //
00026 // It also implements 0 and infinite size fifos - but the size
00027 // zero fifos aren't rendezvous like zero length fifos, they simply are both
00028 // full and empty at the same time.
00029 //
00030 // The size can be dynamically changed using the resize interface
00031 //
00032 // To get an infinite fifo use a -ve size in the constructor.
00033 // The absolute value of the size is taken as the starting size of the
00034 // actual physical buffer.
00035 //
00036 
00037 //#include <systemc>
00038 
00039 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_interfaces/tlm_fifo_ifs.h"
00040 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/circular_buffer.h"
00041 
00042 namespace tlm {
00043 
00044 template <typename T> class tlm_annotated_fifo;
00045 
00046 template <typename T>
00047 class tlm_fifo :
00048   public virtual tlm_fifo_get_if<T>,
00049   public virtual tlm_fifo_put_if<T>,
00050   public sc_core::sc_prim_channel
00051 {
00052 public:
00053 
00054     // constructors
00055 
00056     explicit tlm_fifo( int size_ = 1 )
00057       : sc_core::sc_prim_channel( sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name( "fifo" ) ) {
00058      
00059       init( size_ );
00060 
00061     }
00062 
00063     explicit tlm_fifo( const char* name_, int size_ = 1 )
00064       : sc_core::sc_prim_channel( name_ ) {
00065     
00066       init( size_ );
00067 
00068     }
00069 
00070     // destructor
00071 
00072     virtual ~tlm_fifo() {
00073 
00074       if( buffer != 0 ) delete buffer;
00075 
00076     }
00077 
00078     // tlm get interface
00079 
00080     T get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 );
00081 
00082     bool nb_get( T& );
00083     bool nb_can_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00084     const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00085       return m_data_written_event;
00086     }
00087 
00088     // tlm peek interface
00089 
00090     T peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00091 
00092     bool nb_peek( T& ) const;
00093     bool nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00094     const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00095       return m_data_written_event;
00096     }
00097 
00098     // tlm put interface 
00099 
00100     void put( const T& );
00101 
00102     bool nb_put( const T& );
00103     bool nb_can_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const;
00104 
00105     const sc_core::sc_event& ok_to_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00106       return m_data_read_event;
00107     }
00108 
00109     // resize if
00110 
00111     void nb_expand( unsigned int n = 1 );
00112     void nb_unbound( unsigned int n = 16 );
00113 
00114     bool nb_reduce( unsigned int n = 1 );
00115     bool nb_bound( unsigned int n );
00116 
00117     // debug interface
00118 
00119     bool nb_peek( T & , int n ) const;
00120     bool nb_poke( const T & , int n = 0 );
00121 
00122     int used() const {
00123       return m_num_readable - m_num_read;
00124     }
00125 
00126     int size() const {
00127       return m_size;
00128     }
00129 
00130     void debug() const {
00131 
00132       if( is_empty() ) std::cout << "empty" << std::endl;
00133       if( is_full() ) std::cout << "full" << std::endl;
00134 
00135       std::cout << "size " << size() << " - " << used() << " used "
00136                 << std::endl;
00137       std::cout << "readable " << m_num_readable
00138                 << std::endl;
00139       std::cout << "written/read " << m_num_written << "/" << m_num_read
00140                 << std::endl;
00141 
00142     }
00143 
00144     // support functions
00145 
00146     static const char* const kind_string;
00147 
00148     const char* kind() const
00149         { return kind_string; }
00150 
00151 
00152     friend class tlm::tlm_annotated_fifo<T>;
00153 
00154 private: // some methods to support tlm_annotated_fifo !
00155 
00156     bool nb_can_put( int count , tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const {
00157       if( m_size < 0 ) {
00158         return true;
00159       }
00160       return m_num_readable + m_num_written + count <= m_size;
00161     }
00162 
00163     bool nb_get_no_notify( T& );
00164 
00165 protected:
00166     sc_core::sc_event &read_event( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) {
00167       return m_data_read_event;
00168     }
00169 
00170 protected:
00171 
00172     void update();
00173 
00174     // support methods
00175 
00176     void init( int );
00177 
00178 protected:
00179 
00180     circular_buffer<T> *buffer;
00181 
00182     int m_size;                  // logical size of fifo
00183 
00184     int m_num_readable;          // #samples readable
00185     int m_num_read;              // #samples read during this delta cycle
00186     int m_num_written;           // #samples written during this delta cycle
00187     bool m_expand;               // has an expand occurred during this delta cycle ? 
00188     int m_num_read_no_notify;    // #samples read without notify during this delta cycle
00189 
00190     sc_core::sc_event m_data_read_event;
00191     sc_core::sc_event m_data_written_event;
00192 
00193 private:
00194 
00195     // disabled
00196     tlm_fifo( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00197     tlm_fifo& operator = ( const tlm_fifo<T>& );
00198 
00199     //
00200     // use nb_can_get() and nb_can_put() rather than the following two
00201     // private functions
00202     //
00203 
00204     bool is_empty() const { 
00205       return used() == 0;
00206     }
00207 
00208     bool is_full() const {
00209       return size() == m_num_readable + m_num_written;
00210     }
00211 
00212 };
00213 
00214 template <typename T>
00215 const char* const tlm_fifo<T>::kind_string = "tlm_fifo";
00216 
00217 
00218 /******************************************************************
00219 //
00220 // init and update
00221 //
00222 ******************************************************************/
00223 
00224 template< typename T >
00225 inline 
00226 void
00227 tlm_fifo<T>::init( int size_ ) {
00228 
00229   if( size_ > 0 ) {
00230     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( size_);
00231   }
00232   
00233   else if( size_ < 0 ) {
00234     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( -size_ );
00235   }
00236 
00237   else {
00238     buffer = new circular_buffer<T>( 16 );
00239   }
00240 
00241   m_size = size_;
00242   m_num_readable = 0;
00243   m_num_read = 0;
00244   m_num_written = 0;
00245   m_expand = false;
00246   m_num_read_no_notify = false;
00247 
00248 }
00249 
00250 template < typename T>
00251 inline
00252 void
00253 tlm_fifo<T>::update()
00254 {
00255     if( m_num_read > m_num_read_no_notify || m_expand ) {
00256         m_data_read_event.notify( sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME );
00257     }
00258 
00259     if( m_num_written > 0 ) {
00260         m_data_written_event.notify( sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME );
00261     }
00262 
00263     m_expand = false;
00264     m_num_read = 0;
00265     m_num_written = 0;
00266     m_num_readable = buffer->used();
00267     m_num_read_no_notify = 0;
00268 
00269 }
00270 
00271 } // namespace tlm

00274 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo_peek.h"
00275 #include "tlm_h/tlm_core/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo_resize.h"
00276 
00277 #endif
